name: Filtrer les actualit√©s en cybers√©curit√© pour votre pile technologique (OpenAI + Pinecone RAG)
description:
## Ce que cela fait :
Collecte des actualit√©s en cybers√©curit√© √† partir de flux RSS de confiance et utilise les capacit√©s de g√©n√©ration augment√©e par r√©cup√©ration (RAG) d'OpenAI avec Pinecone pour filtrer le contenu directement pertinent pour la pile technologique de votre organisation. ¬´ Pertinent ¬ª signifie que l'IA recherche des articles d'actualit√© qui mentionnent vos outils, fournisseurs, cadres, plateformes cloud, langages de programmation, syst√®mes d'exploitation ou solutions de s√©curit√© sp√©cifiques ‚Äî comme d√©crit dans vos documents de port√©e .txt. En s'entra√Ænant sur ces documents, le syst√®me comprend l'environnement dans lequel vous op√©rez et peut prioriser les actualit√©s qui pourraient affecter votre posture de s√©curit√©, votre conformit√© ou votre stabilit√© op√©rationnelle. Une fois filtr√©s, des r√©sum√©s des √©l√©ments les plus importants sont envoy√©s √† votre e-mail professionnel chaque jour.

## Comment cela fonctionne
- **Rassemble des actualit√©s √† partir de plusieurs flux RSS ax√©s sur la cybers√©curit√© :** Le flux de travail collecte automatiquement des articles provenant de sources d'actualit√©s de s√©curit√© de confiance et √† fort signal. Ces flux couvrent l'intelligence des menaces, les divulgations de vuln√©rabilit√©s, les avis des fournisseurs et les mises √† jour de l'industrie.
- **Filtre les articles pour leur actualit√© et leur connexion directe √† votre pile technologique document√©e :** En utilisant la date de publication, il √©limine le contenu obsol√®te ou p√©rim√©. Ensuite, en s'appuyant sur vos documents de port√©e .txt stock√©s dans Pinecone, il v√©rifie chaque article pour des r√©f√©rences √† vos technologies, fournisseurs, plateformes ou outils de s√©curit√©.
- **Utilise OpenAI pour g√©n√©rer et examiner des r√©sum√©s concis :** Pour chaque article pertinent, OpenAI cr√©e un r√©sum√© court et clair des points cl√©s. L'IA √©value √©galement si l'article fournit des informations exploitables ou critiques avant de le transmettre.
- **S'entra√Æne sur votre port√©e en utilisant Pinecone Vector Store (gratuit) pour un filtrage contextuel :** Vos documents de port√©e sont int√©gr√©s dans un magasin de vecteurs afin que l'IA puisse ¬´ se souvenir ¬ª de votre environnement. Ce contexte garantit que le processus de filtrage comprend des connexions indirectes ou non √©videntes √† votre pile technologique.
- **Agr√®ge et envoie uniquement les √©l√©ments les plus critiques √† votre e-mail professionnel :** Le syst√®me compile les √©l√©ments d'actualit√© les plus prioritaires dans un seul digest quotidien, afin que vous puissiez examiner les d√©veloppements cl√©s sans vous noyer dans des histoires non pertinentes.

## Ce que vous devez faire :
1. Configurez vos identifiants OpenAI et Pinecone dans le flux de travail
2. Cr√©ez et configurez un index Pinecone (dimension 1536 recommand√©e)
	1. Pinecone est gratuit √† configurer.
	2. Configurez Pinecone avec un seul index gratuit.
	3. Utilisez un espace de noms comme : port√©e.
	4. Assurez-vous que le mod√®le d'int√©gration est le m√™me pour toutes vos r√©f√©rences Pinecone.
3. Soumettez des documents de port√©e .txt listant vos technologies, fournisseurs, plateformes, cadres et produits de s√©curit√©.
	1. .txt n'a pas besoin d'√™tre structur√©.
	2. Ajoutez autant de d√©tails que possible.
4. Mettez √† jour les invites de l'IA pour d√©crire avec pr√©cision l'environnement et les priorit√©s de votre entreprise.

parameters.text:
=You are a cybersecurity threat intelligence analyst. Your goal is to sort through cybersecurity news. Since we are a small team, only include news that includes specific vulnerabilities or is extremely relevant and requires our action. My firm uses these systems: - List out here - List as many as you can think of - This is where you list Title of article: {{ $json.title }} Review this content: {{ $json.content }} Here is the link: {{ $json.link }} Use the Pinecone Vector Store tool as it has context on if the article content is relevant. This will help you find context for what is in scope (relevant) and what is out of scope. If you think I should read this, please summarize the content and include the link. If not applicable, return one word: N/A - without any additional info. In general I am busy so I don't want to read often. If it does not seem actionable or highly relevant, return one word: N/A Format the output in HTML with a header and body. No need to define as HTML document because it will be embeded in an email. Header should be a five words describing the article. Format should be:

Five Word Title Goes Here

Summary: Then explain the article's summary.

Read the full article

parameters.toolDescription: Retrieve data from your vector store Pinecone

parameters.content:
## Test RAG
Use this chatbot to test if RAG is working and has the correct data.

## Document submission for RAG
This workflow is how you upload .txt files to RAG for ingestion.

parameters.text:
=You are a cybersecurity executive advisor responsible for vetting the output of a threat intelligence analyst. The analyst's job is to scan cybersecurity news and produce executive summaries of articles that may impact my company. You are the second layer of review before anything gets sent to the Analyst.

Your job is to decide if the summary is strong enough to be worth forwarding. Only approve it if it is highly actionable, time-sensitive, preventative measures or involves software/platforms used by our company. Your pass rate for an article should hover around 75%.

Decision Options:
If the article should be forwarded, improve the HTML formatting slightly if needed.
If the article should NOT be sent, return this exact response:N/A

Evaluation Criteria:
The article involves a vulnerability, exploit, or incident impacting the listed platforms
It describes a current threat actor campaign or tactic we are likely to encounter
It includes a CVE with confirmed exploitation or ties to CISA KEV
It describes vendor patching guidance or mitigation steps relevant to our stack
Anything else is not worth passing along

Tone:
Be brief and clinical
No speculation
No flattery
Prioritize reducing cognitive load for busy executives

AI Agent output for review:
{{ $json.output }}

parameters.content:
## RSS feeds
Pulls RSS feeds from main cybersecurity news sites.

## Limit length of article
Some articles are really long. Limits length while still keeping enough for AI to understand

parameters.toolDescription: Pull data from here to have context on what articles are relative based on feedback stored in the vector store.

nodes.name: If AI Agent thinks article is relevant to you
If second ai agent thinks article is relevant
Do nothing - Ai Agent thinks article is irrelevant

parameters.content:
## AI Agent 1 = Pinecone Scope Reviewer
This AI Agent reviews the Pinecone Vector Store and determines if the articles match the scope of what you have defined in the .txt documents you have added to Pinecone.

## AI Agent 2 = Review again
This AI Agent's job is to decide if the summary is strong enough to be worth forwarding. It only approves it if it is highly actionable, time-sensitive, preventative measures or involves software/platforms used by your company.

main.node: If AI Agent thinks article is relevant to you
If second ai agent thinks article is relevant
Do nothing - Ai Agent thinks article is irrelevant

user.name: Will Carlson
user.bio: IT Security and Compliance professional with a deep passion for AI and AI Orchestration.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
